name: Tiny Sub
description:
Oh no! Tiny Sub has fallen into an underwater cave system! There's ONLY ONE way out of this, because Tiny Sub's engine functions in ONLY ONE direction! Thankfully, it takes ONLY ONE button to control: press Z to propel yourself forward and up!

Credits:
Soundole (Peter Anthony Smith): Design, Programming, Additional Art, Music
Bookwyrmle (Erin Harrison-Smith): Art, Level Design
